title: Acta Arctica
additional-notes: This is a Danish publication.  Its contents may still be copyrighted even without renewals or copyright notices, if they meet GATT copyright restoration requirements for works first published outside the US.
As this was a monographic series, copyright checks for a monograph in the series should include a search on the title of the monograph as a book, as well as on the serial.
acknowledgement: Thanks to Paul Ryersbach for copyright research on this title.
